original_title: Borrá todo lo que dije del amor porque no sabía bien quién era
overview: The ears of the standing horses are cut off above the closed dawn. A girl roller skates on the parquet floor of an empty apartment. In the rain-coloured garden, a white rose bush with dew. A film of process, of observations and notes on the inner landscape and the beauty of lost moments.
title: Borrá todo lo que dije del amor porque no sabía bien quién era
